Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Jug
Description: Fragment of the rim and body of a jug with moulding at the top. It bears a geometrical painted decoration in wine-red on the basis of horizontal and vertical lines, zigzags and oblique lines. In addition it shows a zoomorphic decoration, representing a bird and stars, the whole distributed over metopae. Ochre-coloured paste and surface.
